summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1452, for the improvement of Lakeview Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from the north line of East Park Addition to the City of Seattle in East Newton Street, by grading and curbing the same, including all necessary bulkheads or retaining walls for cuts and fills under Ordinance No. 15618 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
